footer_description: FreshCart is your on-stop destination for fresh groceries, organic produce, and household essentials delivered to your doorstep
login_desc: Join thousands of happy customers who enjoy fresh groceries delivered right to their doorstep
welcome_desc: Sign in to continue your fresh shopping experience
password_regex: password must be minimum 8 characters least one capital character one low case character one number one special character
signup_desc: Join thousands of happy customers who enjoy fresh groceries delivered right to their doorstep
premium_quality_desc: Premium quality products sourced from trusted suppliers
free_delivery_desc: Same-day delivered available in most areas
secure_shopping_desc: From data and payments are completely secure
sara_johnson_desc: FreeCart has completely changed how i shop for groceries, the quality is amazing and delivery is always on time!
signup_subtitle: Start your fresh journey with us today
name_max: name must be at least 20 characters
terms_required: You must accept our terms and conditions
why_account: Why create an account with FreshCart
faster_checkout_desc: Save your delivery information for a quicker shopping experience.
exclusive_deals_desc: Get access to member-only discounts and early sale notification
order_history_desc: Early track and recorder your favorite products from the past purchases
forget_password_desc: No worries! Enter your email address and we'll send you link to reset your password
secure_notice_desc: For your security, a password reset link will be sent to your registered email address. The link will expire after 30 minutes
contact_support_desc: Our customer support team is available 24/7 to assist you
faqs_desc: Find answers to frequently asked questions about your account
email_not_received_desc: Check your spam folder or request a new reset link
forget_password_msg: We send you code, please check your email address
verify_email_desc: we've sent a verification code to your email address.
verify_email_msg: The code is correct, please reset your password
reset_password_desc: Enter your email address and new password to reset your account password
reset_password_msg: The password is reset successfully, please login
